responses.no: ASK May I speak with anyone who is 18 or over? IF NO ONE 18 OR OVER AT HOME THANK AND TERMINATE.

questions.question: Do you have a T.V. set at home?
Do you have a car in your family?
Do you smoke cigarettes, that is, at least a pack a week?

responses.no: IF NO TO BOTH Q.1C & Q.2 - TERMINATE AND RECORD UNDER NO SHOKER ON CALL RECORD SHEET

questions.question: Does anyone else 18 or older who is currently living at home smoke cigarettes, that is, at least a pack a week?

responses.no: IF NO TO BOTH Q.1C & Q.2 - TERMINATE AND RECORD UNDER NO SHOKER ON CALL RECORD SHEET

questions.question: Could you please tell me the ages of all the men 18 or over from the youngest to the oldest living in this household who smoke cigarettes?
questions.note: IF RESPONDENT IS MALE & SMOKES ADD Be sure to include yourself

responses.record: RECORD AT SHOKER 234 BELOW IN ORDER UP TO 4 ONLY AND SKIP TO Q.4 IF MORE THAN FOUR RECORD FIRST FOUR ONLY AND SKIP TO Q.4 IF NONE CHECK HERE AND ASK Q.3b

questions.question: Now could you tell me the ages of all the women 18 or over from the youngest to the oldest living in this household who smoke cigarettes?
questions.note: IF RESPONDENT IS FEMALE & SMOKES ADD Be sure to include yourself

responses.record: RECORD FROM LEFT TO RIGHT BELOW UP TO 4 ONLY

questions.question: For each person mentioned in Q.3a or Q.3b, is [MENTION PERSON BY AGE & SEX OR AS YOUR HUSBAND, YOUR SON, ETC.] at home now?

speak_to.question: May I speak to him/her or your husband, etc. please?
speak_to.note: REPEAT INTRODUCTION IF NECESSARY AND THEN SKIP TO Q.6 IF DESIRED SMOKER CANNOT BE INTERVIEWED EVEN THOUGH AT HOME ASK Q.5b

call_back.question: I'd like to call back later. What would be a good time to reach him/her or your husband, etc. at this number?
call_back.record: RECORD SMOKER'S NAME, CALLBACK DATE & TIME

note: NO INTERVIEW POSSIBLE EVEN THOUGH ONE OR MORE SMOKERS IN HOUSEHOLD
